title: New Rules, No Mercy (Ep 1184)
description:
In this episode, I address the explosive legal finding dropped by General Mike Flynn’s legal team which exposes the whole Spygate scheme. I also address the astonishing hypocrisy of the Democrats and how to fight back. News Picks:The Ukraine investigation is heating up. 

 

General Flynn’s attorney is done with the BS.

 

This 2019 article is a critical read regarding the Spygate plotters.

 

This Democrat Senator may have broken the law in meeting with this Iranian.

 

Trump strikes back after Obama tried to take credit for the booming economy.

 

More information on the Iowa Caucus shenanigans.

 

New study shows no link between rifle bans and mass shootings. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
